summary: Comprehensive testing of Quantum Logistics design system transformation. Tested desktop layout (264px sidebar, header features), mobile responsiveness (bottom nav, hidden sidebar, hamburger drawer), dashboard KPIs/charts, Returns page CRUD, Warehouse zones/depots. Backend: 100% pass (20/20 tests). Frontend: All critical features working.

issues: 'Made with Emergent' badge in bottom-right corner can intercept hover/click events on AI assistant FAB button on desktop

critical_code_review_comments: index.css: Button hover/active states correctly implemented with translateY(-1px) and scale(0.98)
DashboardLayout.js: Clean responsive breakpoint handling (mobile <768px, tablet 768-1024px, desktop >1024px)
Warehouse zones/depots use STATIC frontend data (MOCKED - not DB-backed) as designed
seed_data_creation: Created test returns during testing: TEST-UI-ITER2-001, TEST-BEX-* entries from pytest
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 1-2 features fully functional. Desktop sidebar (264px full, 68px collapsed). Mobile bottom nav with 4 items (Accueil, Colis, Retours, Profil). Dashboard has 4 KPI cards and 4 charts. Returns page has CRUD with auto-decision logic. Warehouse uses static data. GET /api/carriers now properly requires auth (returns 401). POST /api/routing/optimize is public.
mocked_apis_note: Warehouse zones/depots data is STATIC (hardcoded in WarehousePage.js) - NOT fetched from database. This is by design.

returns_page.status_buttons: Stock/Rebut buttons visible on pending items
